abstract_ssm: This collection primarily consists of two handwritten copies of two specifications booklets, "Specifications for the Mason Work and Materials" and "Specifications for the Carpenter Work and Materials," as well as a photograph of a house built for John J. Merritt. Also included is a small black-and-white photograph of the house. John J. Merritt's house was located on the corner of Columbia Heights and Orange Street in the Brooklyn Heights neighborhood of Brooklyn.
